channel.title: I read the Java thing, but still!
channel.description:
I get this error when i try to compile [code]"title" is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file[/code]
I have JDK 1.5.0_09.
What should i have in my compiler/runserver and what other stuff to do to make it work?
I read the Java answer but, that didn't really help.. I tried

item.title: I read the Java thing, but still!
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

You have Title in the compiler line. Instead of

@echo off title Untitled Server Compiler color 7c "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause yours is something different.

Read full topic
item.source: I read the Java thing, but still!

owch, it deleted my compiler.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 05, 2007, 03:32:00 AM[/size][hr]Sorry for double post but.
I just dl’ed a new Testscape and i ran compiler and it worked without editting it
that’s a good thing right?
